price: in a nearby land[3], but they will gain victory after their defeat
arabic: فِيٓ أَدۡنَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَهُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ غَلَبِهِمۡ سَيَغۡلِبُونَ
footnotes: [3] Or in the lowest part of the earth.
